bwwExcerpt: So what exactly is being celebrated in Prince of Broadway? The answer to that question starts becoming apparent when George and Amalia of SHE LOVES ME each sing a nervous solo anticipating their blind date. It continues when Buddy of FOLLIES angrily reacts to the indifference he receives from his wife, Sally, which he claims has driven him to cheat on her.
